page.title: 14Pollution
page.content: The fruits are strawberries,rasberry, blackcurrents,gooseberries and blackberries. When the farm first opened there were only 12-14 cows which was enough to keep the family going with food. {Desborough Motors}started in 1936.Since then the A6 has turned into a major road and buiness has become better.However this has created more pollution because of the increased volume of cars on the A6. These give off petrol fames, containing lead and perhaps fruit growers will suffer from this.Most of the public now own cars and use the garage. The garage is not popular with all people as it sometimes gives out petrol fumes.
